name: WeAreTheAntidote
description:
Year 2050, Humanity enters a crictical phase. Natural ressources are being depleted, and the consequencies of the global Warming are visibles. World population still grows. The more they are, the faster the end will come.

Your new job is consists in resolving the problem of surpopulation. You’ll have all the usual tools. Don’t forget, we work for their own good. We regulate their developpement. And that’s good for everyone. This planet is sick with so much humans. We Are The Antidote!


Created for the ludum Dare 42. Solo work !
